sentences.en: He walked outside to a walkway and paused.
sentences.cn: 他走出后门来到人行道边然后停下了.

sentences.en: In the asymmetrical applications, the plane of the cables is at the edge of the walkway.
sentences.cn: 当不对称布置时, 索面布置在人行道的一侧.

sentences.en: It's window by the narrow walkway, few people will notice for it's height.
sentences.cn: 这个窗口在一条很窄的走道旁边, 因为太高一般不太注意得到.

sentences.en: Mall: Malls typically are enclosed, with a climate - controlled walkway between two facing strips of stores.
sentences.cn: 摩尔: 典型的摩尔应具备人工气候,两边条状排列着许多商店的步行街.

sentences.en: Paths of bark chippings will help to give the impression of a woodland walkway.
sentences.cn: 铺满碎树皮的小路有助于制造林间小道的印象。

sentences.en: Portico Colonnaded porch or entrance to a structure, or covered walkway supported by regularly spaced columns.
sentences.cn: 建筑物有柱的走廊或入口, 或有一定间隔的柱子支承的带顶信道.

sentences.en: Suddenly he sprang, clearing a three - metre gap between the walkway and a 3 ) concrete 4 ) canopy below.
sentences.cn: 突然,他跳了起来, 从距离下面的水泥遮篷3米高的走道上跳了下来.

sentences.en: The 17 - something boy was 1 ) poised, 2 ) crouching catlike on the narrow walkway, three or four stories up.
sentences.cn: 那个年约17 岁 的男孩准备好了, 他像猫一样蹲伏在狭窄的 、 离地面有三四层楼高的走道上.

sentences.en: The airport hotel will be linked to the terminal building by a covered walkway.
sentences.cn: 机场酒店将由一条有顶通道和航站楼相连。

sentences.en: The hotel was connected with the station by a walkway.
sentences.cn: 人行道把旅馆和车站连接起来.

sentences.en: The walkway is supported on three equally light arches.
sentences.cn: 人行道由三个同等轻拱支撑.

sentences.en: Then she started walking up the walkway to the door of her quaint looking home.
sentences.cn: 然后她沿着人行道向她那看起来有点奇怪的屋子走去.

sentences.en: This walkway was not conducive to Marianne's shoes, however.
sentences.cn: 但这种走道不利于玛丽安的鞋子.

sentences.en: TO count in the ward or on the walkway is forbidden.
sentences.cn: 禁止在病房、走道上清点衣被.

sentences.en: Walking the last part of that walkway was really special.
sentences.cn: 登上阶梯的最后几层,真的是很非凡.

sentences.en: You can have the model pose anywhere along the walkway.
sentences.cn: 你可以让这个模特出现在沿人行道的任何位置.

trans.tran_en: an outdoor path built for people to walk along, often above the ground
